price: የመጸወቱ ወንዶችና፣ የመጸወቱ ሴቶች፣ ለአላህም መልካምን ብድር ያበደሩ ለእነርሱ መልካም ምንዳ አልላቸው፡፡
arabic: إِنَّ ٱلۡمُصَّدِّقِينَ وَٱلۡمُصَّدِّقَٰتِ وَأَقۡرَضُواْ ٱللَّهَ قَرۡضًا حَسَنٗا يُضَٰعَفُ لَهُمۡ وَلَهُمۡ أَجۡرٞ كَرِيمٞ

version.title: Amharic translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Amharic by Muhammad Sadeq and Muhammad Ath-Thany Habib. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center. The original translation is available for suggestions, continuous evaluation and development.

meta.transliteration: inna al-muṣadiqīna wal-muṣadiqāti wa-aqraḍū al-laha qarḍan ḥasanan yuḍāʿafu lahum walahum ajrun karīmun
translations: and the women who give charity
